name: COMMONWEALTH OF PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, Appellee v. Ernest DENOFA, Appellant

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 17th day of August, 2009, the order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.
